 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלַב‎</span>] **verb Pu\`al** ==be bound, joined== (Late Hebrew Punic = Biblical Hebrew; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁלִיבָה‎</span> ***rung*** of ladder; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁלִיבִין‎</span> apparently only [[1Kgs.7.28|1Kgs 7:28]]; [[1Kgs.7.29|1Kgs 7:29]], <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***ravine, narrow path between mountains***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***is seize, carry off, by force***); — ***Participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשֻׁלָּבֹת‎</span> [[Exod.26.17|Exod 26:17]] tenons ***joined*** each to (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span>) its fellow, [[Exod.36.22|Exod 36:22]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]).
